entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:43 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
